author: ate
msg: RAVE-437: Check and cleanup of NOTICE files to only include 3rd party usages which require a (separate) notice.
- Update the license notice for using rome modules (modules-0.3.2.jar), which is dual licensed under LGPL or Apache 2 license
- Also made explicit using h2 database (also dual licensed) here under the Apache 2 license.
- NB: the based rome dependency itself (rome-1.0.jar) is (only) licensed under the Apache 2 license and doesn't need additional notices.
